name: Math.random
content:
Returns a random number ranging from 0 (inclusive) up to but not including 1 (exclusive)

You will find many opportunities in your apps to utilize random numbers. You could use it to simulate something like the roll of a dice or you could use it to make something occur randomly in your programs like a sound or an image appearing on the screen.

examples.name: Print a random number between values
Use a random number to simulate a coin flip
